textAfterTable: Description The Brave Soul Women's Detroit Tigers Sweatshirt in red and grey features long sleeves, round neck line and large tiger graphic located to the front. With contrasting sleeves, this sweatshirt has ribbed trim detail to the neck, sleeves and hem to finish the look. - GG. Brave Soul Women's Detroit Tigers Sweatshirt - Crimson 100% Cotton Contrast coloured sleeves Round neck Large tiger graphic Regular fit Product Details Brand: Brave Soul Colour: Grey/Red Material: 100% Cotton.
